text: @watsonchas Thanks Charles. What is doubly scandalous is the abrogation of responsibility for this disaster among regulators/ministers. The ‚Äònot me guv‚Äô attitude is infuriating and depressing and creates zero trust of the @EnvAgency among those who do care about our rivers.

New job - I am thrilled to have started a new job at the Environment Agency @EnvAgency in the National Flood Hydrology team. Such a warm welcome! Very pleased to be part of the EA and to help protect people and the environment.

@EnvAgencyMids @NaturalEngland @ForestryComm @ForestryEngland @WorcsWT @severnrivers @EnvAgency @HerefordshireWT @HelenStace_HWT I rang your incident hotline first thing this morning.  I also sent an email.
